column5: The odd bloke here at W.C. likes to read the odd fish tale. This fall at home in Ontario there were plenty fish caught so now there's plenty fishing to share. Love fall fishing, it really is hard to beat. Three stories! The first is all sturgeon, the second is my buddy Mike's road trip to Manitoba for tiger trout and the third is big muskies, smallies and walleye. Any interest in reading just link in and enjoy... FALL'S FIVE FOOTERS FOR FAMILY & FRIENDS.http://bunksoutdoorangle.com/falls-f...amily-friends/MANITOBA'S TROPHY TIGER TROUT... by Mikey!http://bunksoutdoorangle.com/manitob...rout-by-mikey/LUNKERS OF THE FALL.http://bunksoutdoorangle.com/lunkers-of-the-fall/Keep safe on that early ice & Happy Holidays. Bunk.
Thanks for sharing Andrew, as always appreciate it.
Another nice read & your photos are amazing. The clarity and coloring of the fish is awesome.
